channel.title: Project Nemesis
channel.description:
OK, well it's been a while since I've been back into coding. (Was camping for a few days, it's a lot of fun). These are the things I've added, and things I need to fix/add.
HOW I GOT THE NAME "NEMESIS!": Well, I was messing around on MySpace, watching UnderOATH videos, and I found an Arch Enemy one, and I watched it, amazed at how a hot chick can have amazing heavy metal vocals, and the songs name was "Nemesis" so I decided to use that as the name.
WEBSITE: www.nemesisserver.co.nr
99 max skill 126 max combat Prayer Client Fletching-Need a better version Woodcutting-Removed due to bugs Herblore Agility-Buggy still Cooking Fishing Mining Smithing Gambling Gold Dust No portals Renamed teleporting places, so use those to get to KBD, Jad, Dragons, Wildy, etc! No item commands EXTREMELY challenging, I'm talking like 50 EXP per hit on a NPC. Most items are found by killing NPC's Kalphite Queen RARELY drops Dragon Chain and 2h. Maybe 1/50 chance, and has over 780 HP! Jad RARELY drops Fire Cape, talking a 1/20 chance, and I'll make him 500 HP. King Black Dragon drops Dragon Medium Helmet, pretty rare. Steel Dragons drop Dragon Legs, and Dragon Square, EXTREMELY RARE! Torso Minigame (Not hard, lowest lvl I've done it at is like 40 lol). Will work on this NO ITEM COMMANDS I FUCKING HATE THOSE NO ADMIN ONLY OR MOD ONLY COMMANDS! Only commands are ::yell, ::kick, and ::bank I believe. Stores are pretty much obsolete, so you'll start off with only the gear needed. Click on the skill you want to learn info about, brings it up from a text document. CREDITS TO VORARG! 377 cache'd client Working Fire Capes New Admin and Mod icons Head Icons (Prayer) NO ITEM COMMANDS-I'm just so happy!
Things to get done: Thieving Crafting Runecrafting Farming Slayer Fix NPC hits. Fix hitting on NPC's. I.E.-If a man has 7 hp, you can't hit over 7 on him. Fixing Ice Barrage (doesn't work for some reason). Better weapon animation Make it more challenging, and maybe a new NPC with over 8K HP that 1/30 kills drops a partyhat. NO-IP WON'T WORK FOR ME, unless someone can help me with port-forwarding, I've done it, but I don't know what to put for the TCP port part. Better background for client-DONE, I just messed around in PS for my first 20 minutes and made stupid patterns.
POST SUGGESTIONS! If I see item commands, or faster training, I'll give ya a good talkin' to about it, the only fun part about pservs, is the challenge, am I right? It's no fun being 126-253 cmb in 30 seconds.
Credits so far: 5% Vorarg for the Skill Menus 5% to whoever made the Gold Dust 35% to Wolf for the base 55% to me for adding in custom Fishing, Cooking, Smithing, Mining, and Herblore.

item.title: Project Nemesis
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

OK, well it’s been a while since I’ve been back into coding. (Was camping for a few days, it’s a lot of fun). These are the things I’ve added, and things I need to fix/add.

HOW I GOT THE NAME “NEMESIS!”:
Well, I was messing around on MySpace, watching UnderOATH videos, and I found an Arch Enemy one, and I watched it, amazed at how a hot chick can have amazing heavy metal vocals, and the songs name was “Nemesis” so I decided to use that as the name.

WEBSITE: www.nemesisserver.co.nr

99 max skill
126 max combat
Prayer
Client
Fletching-Need a better version
Woodcutting-Removed due to bugs
Herblore
Agility-Buggy still
Cooking
Fishing
Mining
Smithing
Gambling
Gold Dust
No portals
Renamed teleporting places, so use those to get to KBD, Jad, Dragons, Wildy, etc!
No item commands
EXTREMELY challenging, I’m talking like 50 EXP per hit on a NPC.
Most items are found by killing NPC’s
Kalphite Queen RARELY drops Dragon Chain and 2h. Maybe 1/50 chance, and has over 780 HP!
Jad RARELY drops Fire Cape, talking a 1/20 chance, and I’ll make him 500 HP.
King Black Dragon drops Dragon Medium Helmet, pretty rare.
Steel Dragons drop Dragon Legs, and Dragon Square, EXTREMELY RARE!
Torso Minigame (Not hard, lowest lvl I’ve done it at is like 40 lol). Will work on this
NO ITEM COMMANDS I FUCKING HATE THOSE
NO ADMIN ONLY OR MOD ONLY COMMANDS!
Only commands are ::yell, ::kick, and ::bank I believe.
Stores are pretty much obsolete, so you’ll start off with only the gear needed.
Click on the skill you want to learn info about, brings it up from a text document. CREDITS TO VORARG!
377 cache’d client
Working Fire Capes
New Admin and Mod icons
Head Icons (Prayer)
NO ITEM COMMANDS-I’m just so happy!

Things to get done:
Thieving
Crafting
Runecrafting
Farming
Slayer
Fix NPC hits.
Fix hitting on NPC’s. I.E.-If a man has 7 hp, you can’t hit over 7 on him.
Fixing Ice Barrage (doesn’t work for some reason).
Better weapon animation
Make it more challenging, and maybe a new NPC with over 8K HP that 1/30 kills drops a partyhat.
NO-IP WON’T WORK FOR ME, unless someone can help me with port-forwarding, I’ve done it, but I don’t know what to put for the TCP port part.
Better background for client-DONE, I just messed around in PS for my first 20 minutes and made stupid patterns.

POST SUGGESTIONS! If I see item commands, or faster training, I’ll give ya a good talkin’ to about it, the only fun part about pservs, is the challenge, am I right? It’s no fun being 126-253 cmb in 30 seconds.

Credits so far:
5% Vorarg for the Skill Menus
5% to whoever made the Gold Dust
35% to Wolf for the base
55% to me for adding in custom Fishing, Cooking, Smithing, Mining, and Herblore.
